entry.title: Stein Quest Guides
entry.summary: I've started the process of adding the Stein quest guides I've written to the site. Many Stein quests are rather simple, but in others it's not always clear where to go or what to do, so hopefully some people find them useful. I need to do the quests anyway, so why not document it, right? :) You can view them here In other news, the news(!) links in the game headers and indexes now work correctly.
